italic.text: To provide general transport service in the movement of personnel and cargo.

line.text: In SWORD, transporting crowds or units allows to move them to a given location with appropriate means. Because the agent can only transports crowds' concentrations, this mission needs a loading position to indicate which concentration to transport. Indeed, a crowd can be composed of several separated concentrations and only one concentration can be transported at a time. The agent will transport the nearest concentration from the "loadingPoint" parameter.
